name: Into the Moonlight
description:
Into the Moonlight is a for now a visual novel game, inspired by the developer's (myself) everyday struggles dealing with Dyspraxia, being an introvert, her fears and the people who have come and gone in her life as well as including some funny skits such as memes and other things that makes her laugh.

Marty Mooth the Atlas moth is the main character of the game.  He wants to know what happened to his parents as they died so suddenly years ago. His famous uncle, Mothman, doesn't want Marty to go out on his own as this will be his biggest adventure yet. Along the way, Mothman gets his friends to help Marty on his journey not only figure out what happened to his parents and to see the bright moon shining in the sky but also to get out of his introverted comfort zone. Although, Marty will have to face new bosses to get by and carry on with his adventure.

Will Marty conquer his fears or will his fears conquer him...?
